com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl

Class XmlContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.ContextFactory
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl.XmlContextFactory

  • public class XmlContextFactory
extends ContextFactory

    Provides access to an InfinitumContext singleton. In order for this class to function properly, an infinitum.cfg.xml file must be created and ContextFactory.configure(Context, int) must be called before accessing the InfinitumContext or an InfinitumConfigurationException will be thrown. XmlContextFactory singletons should be acquired by calling the static method XmlContextFactory#instance().

    XmlContextFactory uses the Simple XML framework to read infinitum.cfg.xml and create the InfinitumContext.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 06/25/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

        public InfinitumContext configure(android.content.Context context)
                           throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Description copied from class: ContextFactory
        Configures Infinitum with the implicit configuration file res/raw/infinitum.cfg.xml. This method must be called before attempting to retrieve an InfinitumContext.
        Specified by:
        configure in class ContextFactory
        Parameters:
        context - the calling Context.
        Returns:
        configured InfinitumContext
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the implied configuration file could not be found or if the file could not be parsed

      • getContext

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the InfinitumContext singleton
